title: Validate only one nexthop configured; SSL layer failure , no re-attempts, Logs should show Error 421
custom_steps:
- Enable feature flag 
- Setup only primary nexthop AS HOST='postfix.dtelu.geskope.com' or similar which may have expired cert [No new change for secondary nexthop]
- Ensure that service tries reports SSL error and no Retries
custom_expected:
Following logs were collected with R121 BUILD. 
024-10-18 00:09:28         INFO        smtpproxy-b779755d7-gn4nh        12               SSL 56:              SslLayer.cpp:01789 trid=2954449036288994560 rqid=2954449036288994561 tenantid=1047 user='test1@mail.hippo.local' mode='CLIENT', lname='smtp-proxy', rip='172.18.59.25', rp='25', oip='', op='0', lip='10.114.81.31', lp='55414', sni='postfix.dtelu.geskope.com', fd='102', Verification error: issuer='/C=US/O=Let's Encrypt/CN=R3', subject='/CN=postfix.dtelu.geskope.com', notbefore='Jan  5 05:29:29 2024 GMT', notafter='Apr  4 05:29:28 2024 GMT', serial='0468A11A36834FD9DA0DA2EAFF7C2CFDE3BC', altnames='DNS:postfix.dtelu.geskope.com', sslerr='10', sslerrdesc='certificate has expired', depth='0' action='block'

- Ensure same behavior persist for SSL error in R122
